comments:
Description:
Group can not be created.

Steps to reproduce:
1. new a data source and data set
2. Insert a table, bind it to dataset. 
3. Add a group for table

Result:

*** Bug 135476 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
The group can be created correctly now. Now the group key should be a binding column name.You can create a new binding column on the group if you want to use a complex key.
